name: Category

name: Category.defaultCategory
desc: Returns the default category.

name: CategoryProvider
desc:
A provider class that manages a list of categories and the selected category
index. It extends ChangeNotifier to notify listeners of changes to
categories or the selected index.

name: addCategory
desc: Adds a new category to the list of categories if it doesn't already exist.

name: categories
desc: A getter that returns the list of categories.

name: clearAllCategories
desc: Clears all categories and resets them to the default categories.

name: doesCategoryExist
desc: Checks if a given category exists in the list of categories.

name: initializeCategories
desc:
Initializes the categories based on the habits provided.
New categories from habits are added if they do not already exist.

name: removeCategory
desc: Removes a category from the list of categories and notifies listeners.

name: resetSelectedIndex
desc:
Resets the selected category index to the default value (0) and notifies
listeners.

name: selectedIndex
desc: A getter that returns the currently selected category index.

name: setSelectedIndex
desc:
Sets the selected category index and notifies listeners if the index has
changed.

name: updateSelectedIndex
desc: Updates the selected category index and notifies listeners.

desc: A widget to close the screen.

desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: ColorEx
desc: This class is to supplement deprecated_member_use for Color.value.

name: toARGB32
desc: Return a 32 bit value representing this color.

desc: Returns a DateTime object representing only the date part of the given date.

desc: Helper function to format the minutes for display in habit details.

name: clear
desc: Clears all items from the specified table.

name: delete
desc: Deletes an item from the storage based on the specified table and key.

name: read
desc: Retrieves an item from the storage based on the specified table and key.

name: readAll
desc: Retrieves all items from the specified table.

name: save
desc: Saves an item to the storage.

name: getGreeting
desc: Returns a greeting message based on the current time.

name: Habit
desc: A class representing a habit.

name: Habit.defaultHabit
desc: Returns a default habit object with empty values.

name: Habit.from
desc: Copy constructor to create a new habit object from an existing one.

name: Habit.fromMap
desc: Creates a habit object from a map.

name: copyWith
desc: Returns a copy of the habit object with updated values where provided.

name: getDaysAsWeekdays
desc: Converts the days of the habit to their equivalent weekday values.

name: getNextDueDate
desc: Returns the next due date for the habit based on its schedule.

name: initializeProgress
desc: Initializes the progress of the habit, filling in missing data up to the current date.

name: isCompletedOnDate
desc: Checks if the habit is completed on the specified date.

name: markAsCompleted
desc: Marks the habit as completed on the specified date.

name: markAsNotCompleted
desc: Marks the habit as not completed on the specified date.

name: streak
desc: Calculates the current streak of completed habits.

name: toMap
desc: Converts the habit object into a map.

name: toggleComplete
desc: Toggles the completion status of the habit on the specified date.

name: HabitProvider
desc:
A provider class for managing habits and interacting with the
HabitRepository. It extends ChangeNotifier to notify listeners when
habits or their states change.

name: addHabit
desc: Adds a new habit to the repository and updates the habit list.

name: clearAllHabits
desc: Clears all habits and resets the categories to default values.

name: deleteHabit
desc:
Deletes a habit by its ID and removes its associated category if no other
habits are using it.

name: fetchHabits
desc:
Fetches all habits from the repository and initializes categories for
those habits. Notifies listeners when the data is loaded or an error
occurs.

name: getAllHabits
desc: Returns a list of all habits.

name: getCategoriesWithPendingHabits
desc:
Returns a list of categories that have pending habits (habits that are
not completed).

name: getHabitById
desc: Returns a habit by its ID.

name: getHabitsByCategory
desc: Returns a list of habits that belong to the specified category.

name: getHabitsForToday
desc: Returns a list of habits that are scheduled for today.

name: getPendingHabitsForToday
desc:
Returns a list of all habits that are scheduled for today and are not
completed.

name: getPendingHabitsForTodayByCategory
desc: Returns a list of pending habits for today, filtered by category.

name: toggleHabitComplete
desc: Toggles the completion status of a habit for a specific date.

name: toggleSearch
desc:
Toggles the search mode and clears the search query and filtered habits
when turning off search.

name: updateQuery
desc: Updates the search query and filters habits based on the query.

name: HabitRepository
desc:
A repository class responsible for interacting with the storage layer
to persist and retrieve habit data.

name: clearAllHabits
desc: Clears all habits from the storage.

name: deleteHabit
desc: Deletes a habit from the storage by its ID.

name: getAllHabits
desc:
Fetches all habits from the storage and returns them as a list of Habit
objects.

name: saveHabit
desc: Saves a habit to the storage.

name: MyHabitsPage
desc: A stateless widget representing the habits page.

name: MyHabitsPage
desc: Constructor for the MyHabitsPage widget.

name: build
desc: Builds the widget tree for the Habits page.

name: MyHeatMap
desc: A custom heatmap widget that displays the heatmap for all habits.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: HeatMap
desc: A utility class that generates data for the heat map.

name: generateHeatMapData
desc: Generates data for the heat map based on all habits in the habitProvider.

name: generateHeatMapForHabit
desc: Generates data for the heat map based on a single habit.

name: MyHomePage
desc: The main home page of the app, displaying the Heatmap, habit categories and habits.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: IconDropdown
desc: Widget that represents a dropdown menu to select an icon.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: IdRepository
desc:
A repository class responsible for generating and managing unique habit IDs.
It interacts with the storage layer to persist and retrieve the current
habit ID counter.

name: generateNextHabitId
desc:
Generates the next habit ID by incrementing the current habit ID.
The new ID is saved to the storage.

name: getCurrentHabitId
desc:
Retrieves the current habit ID from the storage.
If no ID is found, it defaults to 0.

name: Language
desc:
A model class representing a language with its properties such as
ID, flag, name, and language code.

name: Language
desc:
Constructs a Language object with the provided id, flag, name,
and languageCode.

name: languageList
desc: Returns a list of predefined Language objects.

name: LineChartWidget
desc: A widget that displays a line chart of habits completed in the last 10 weeks.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: LocaleProvider
desc:
A provider class that manages the app's locale settings.
It extends ChangeNotifier to notify listeners when the locale changes.

name: fetchLocale
desc:
Fetches the stored locale from the LocaleRepository and updates the
locale state. Notifies listeners when the locale is fetched.

name: locale
desc: The current locale of the application.

name: saveLocale
desc:
Saves the provided locale to the LocaleRepository and updates the
locale state.

name: LocaleRepository
desc:
A repository class responsible for interacting with the storage layer
to persist and retrieve the locale setting of the application.

name: getLocale
desc:
Retrieves the stored locale from the storage.
If no locale is found, it defaults to 'en' (English).

name: saveLocale
desc: Saves the provided locale to the storage.

name: locator
desc:
A singleton instance of the GetIt service locator that provides access to
various dependencies across the application.

name: setupLocator
desc:
Configures the service locator by registering various services
and providers.

name: MyApp
desc:
A stateless widget that represents the root of the application.
It sets up multiple providers and configures the MaterialApp widget.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: main
desc:
The entry point of the application.
Initializes necessary services and runs the app.

name: NotificationService
desc: A service class for managing local notifications in the application.

name: flutterLocalNotificationsPlugin
desc: The instance of FlutterLocalNotificationsPlugin used to manage notifications.

name: init
desc: Initializes the notification service with platform-specific settings.

name: onDidReceiveNotification
desc: Handles notification responses when a notification is received.

name: scheduleNotification
desc: Schedules a notification to be shown at a specified time.

name: showInstantNotification
desc: Shows an instant notification with the specified title and body.

name: OwnColors
desc: A custom ThemeExtension to define the colors used in the application.

desc: Creates a copy of this OwnColors but with the given fields replaced with the new values.

name: SwitchState
desc: A class that manages the theme mode state utilizing the ChangeNotifier mixin to allow listeners to react to changes in the theme mode.

name: themeMode

name: toggleThemeMode
desc: Method to update the theme mode and notify listeners about the change.

name: MyTabBarView
desc: Creates a TabBarView widget.

desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: buildGridView
desc: Builds a grid view to display a list of habits.

name: showTodayOnly
desc: Flag to determine if only today's habits should be displayed.

name: MyTabBar
desc: A custom TabBar widget to display categories for navigation.

name: MyTabBar
desc: Creates a TabBar widget.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: isScrollable
desc: Whether the TabBar should be scrollable.

name: showTodayOnly
desc: Whether to show only categories with habits due today.

name: darkMode
desc:
Color and design theme for dark mode.
This theme is used in the app when the device is in dark mode
or when the user has selected light mode in the app settings.
The theme is based on the Material Design color scheme
and the custom colors defined in the OwnColors class.

name: lightMode
desc:
Color and design theme for light mode.
This theme is used in the app when the device is in light mode
or when the user has selected light mode in the app settings.
The theme is based on the Material Design color scheme
and the custom colors defined in the OwnColors class.

name: TimeButtonWidget
desc: A button widget to select a reminder time.

desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: TitleFormfieldWidget
desc: A formfield widget to set/change the title of a habit.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: UsernameProvider
desc:
A provider class that manages the application's username. It extends
ChangeNotifier to notify listeners when the username is updated.

name: fetchUsername
desc:
Fetches the stored username from the UsernameRepository and updates
the _username state. Also updates the TextEditingController's text to
the fetched username.
Notifies listeners when the username is fetched.

name: saveUsername
desc:
Saves the provided username to the UsernameRepository and updates the
_username state.

name: updateFromController
desc:
Updates the username from the TextEditingController and saves it to the
repository.

name: username
desc: The current username of the user.

name: UsernameRepository
desc:
A repository class responsible for interacting with the storage layer
to persist and retrieve the username.

name: getUsername
desc:
Retrieves the stored username from the storage.
If no username is found, an empty string is returned.

name: saveUsername
desc: Saves the provided username to the storage.

name: MyWalkthroughPage
desc: A walkthrough page that displays a series of images to introduce users to the app.

desc: Constructor for the walkthrough page.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: walkthroughImagesDE
desc: List of walkthrough images in German.

name: walkthroughImagesEN
desc: List of walkthrough images in English.
